website_summaries.verdict: A good nano drone option for younger children looking to do more advanced tricks on a simple platform.
pros: Folding body makes an already small drone even more convenient to carry around in small bags
One key take off and landing takes the difficulty out of safety landing the drone without any damage
cons: Motors are more prone to damage than normal if they encounter debris or walls

website_summaries.verdict: A compact drone by a top brand in the industry that's a good choice for kids who are learning the basics and are ready to try some simple tricks.
pros: A basic, reasonably priced drone that's easy for kids to fly
A good choice for beginners who are learning to take off and land, as it features one-button operation for both tasks
Can be folded, so it's easy for kids to take wherever they like
Can handle a few fancy moves
cons: Tends to drift and fly off course in wind
Rough tumbles have been known to cause damage to the motor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for KIDS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing gift for children or new users to drones. My daughter crashed it many times and no issues. Customer service was fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Has altitude control! non-serviceable battery, how every seems ...
customer_reviews.text: Has altitude control! non-serviceable battery, how every seems to hover and do tricks for quite a while and charges very respectable from either the included charge cord or from the Remote. takes 4 AAA batteries for remote. Had problem with my second HS190. Frustrated, I contacted Holy Stone. Feeling it was a manufacture defect and trying to prove it with a video was too much hassle, however Tina with Holy Stone was very persistent over the phone and texts to bring back a smile to my face. Personal thanks to the whole Holy Stone team.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Beeps nonstop while charging.
customer_reviews.text: This drone would be fine and probably a cheap 4 star version, but unfortunately every time you plug it in to charge all it does is beeps nonstop till you want to throw it against the wall. It also will cause many a fight between you and your children.
customer_reviews.author: DianaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great experience overall.
customer_reviews.text: The one I bought for my grand-daughters one of the motors failed after just a few uses. It will not fly, of course, with one motor not spinning. Bought this thing in May, and it crapped in June. Holy Stone read my negative review and sent me a new one. Free of any charges. Grand daughters have only used it once, for one battery charge, so it's longevity is unknown at this time, but at least Holy Stone backs up their products. Must comment on Holy Stone customer service: Reps were great. Courteous, concerned, and friendly. June especially is a wonderful customer service rep. Keep up the good work! Your customers will appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Dreino

customer_reviews.title: Is it me?
customer_reviews.text: I have to be fair, I have no experience with flying drones. I just don't know what to think. I have experience playing Xbox first person shooters which uses the two joystick approach and was quite good, but I have a real hard time flying this thing. I'm SURE I need some practice and getting used to it but was hoping it would be easier and more stable. One thing.. be sure to install the rotor/propeller guards as they can get bent when bumping into walls. It charges well, and seems to have plenty of power to fly... I just can't get it stable inside. Maybe I'll venture out to a park and try to learn a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: JoeGriff

customer_reviews.title: Defective product sent - one propeller didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed - defective piece sent. One of the propellers didn’t work. Had bought it as a gift for my nephew and sent it to him outside US. Was very embarrassed to hear that it was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner drone - and a lot of fun for the indoor winter blues
customer_reviews.text: This nano drone is by far the easiest and best out of the box experience I've had. I've had several over the last two years - their awesome for flying inside in the winter, and help develop and maintain solid piloting skills for the outdoor ones when the weather clears. Flight stability is really enhanced with altitude hold feature, let go of the sticks and this one really does just hover. Good value, and a cool package. yea - it doesn't fold up with the prop guards on it - but the prop guards are easy enough to remove - and it recovers from small errors and survives for another flight with them. Great beginner drone -
customer_reviews.author: James Florwick

customer_reviews.title: So great!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son decided to buy this drone with his saved money from his piggy bank. I was nervous this would be a cheap cheap quality drone and he'd regret ordering it, but I was willing because those are the money lessons I want him to learn early on in life. It was almost all the $ he had saved. Well, we have no regrets! He LOVES it!! This thing has yet to break too! It has been flown into walls (early on in the learning curve) and stepped on in buckets of toys (oops! Lessons learned again!)....still not a thing to break. We love it! All around great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Arndt

customer_reviews.title: Heat drone. Tons of fun!  FAST!!  Easy to learn.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little drone. Great learning tool. If you can put this in the 3rd speed without crashing then you my be ready for an upgrade. These tiny drones have been a God Send for me during this quarantine. I have 3 little HOLY STONE indoor drones. They all fly great. The HS210 is great and bullet proof. You can fly it like a pin ball all over your house and it won’t hurt anything and it won’t hurt the HS210 either. The HS160 is great indoors if you have a little more room. It has a camera and does great outside on a very calm day.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher IXer

customer_reviews.title: Never flew correct and died fast
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible out of the box. I bought for my wife to play around in the house with. I cant imagine a kid trying to use this thing, it wouldnt hover in place to save your life so you constantly have to fight it just maintain some control. I followed the instructions and recalibrated before each flight but still didnt have enough in-flight correction to fix the issues. After maybe a total of 10 minutes of flight time the front left motor died all together and the charger quit working after 5 or 6 charges. I expected much more for $35 and all the great reviews. Wouldnt even waste my time trying a different one. Will be returning ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Drone was very easy to setup and very easy to use. Put 4 AAA batteries in remote control and it was ready to fly. After use, charged drone up with USB supplied. Very fast charging. Great item because you can put in slow mode for beginners so it doesn't get away. Drone is very very fast in high mode. Zooms!!! My grandson loves it and so do I. I highly recommend this seller and product. Great customer service if you have any questions. Very prompt. Very fast shipping. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Sheree

customer_reviews.title: Great little Micro Drone
customer_reviews.text: Holy Stone sells really good drones. These little drones are a lot of fun for the kids and adults. This one is really good for the kids to take with them.The drone is stored inside the remote. When removed and unfolded it looks nice. The operating time is really good for its small size. It recharges pretty quick to get you back in the air. Always remember these micro size drones are very light and wind effects them easily. Always make sure your ceiling fans or AC vents are off. It works really well outside as long as there is no wind.
customer_reviews.author: Joey H.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I could not figure out how to work this. I was disappointed to find out the controller took 4 aaa batteries, which died after 1 hour of trying to get this to work. The instructions were complicated, i could not figure out how to turn on the drone. I asked the seller a few questions and never received an answer. I bought 3 of these as gifts for little boys and since i couldnt figure this out, i didnt give any of these and instead bought alternate gifts. I am returning all of these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice minidrone
customer_reviews.text: is a nice little drone perfect to fly indoors about 4.5 inches has a built in battery that last about 5 to 6 minutes flying the controller uses 4 AAA batteries you can do tricks with it like flipping i dont like that i cant replace the battery in the drone
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Great Mini Drone for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: This drone was very easy to fly and has a lot of helpful features that generally worked well. Overall the drone was very stable and responded well. The only complaint was the headless mode was a little difficult to operate when the person holding the controller moved around. It didn’t seem like the drone adjusted to this movement very rapidly or accurately. Perhaps it was not designed to. Otherwise I would highly recommend this drone for beginners over other mini/nano drones I’ve purchased, including the Cheerson. I wish HolyStone made a version of this drone that has a camera and can be controlled via a smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: BDT

customer_reviews.title: Great Drone for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep my nephew entertained. Took a little while for me to get use to the controls but once I got a handle of it, was extremely fun and durable because I crashed a few times while learning how to fly it. For a small drone it runs super fast and can maneuver pretty quickly. it last about 20 mins of flying before you need to charge it. The automatic spinning is a very nice feature to keep the kids busy while you get some work done. Controller is nice keeps the drone in the middle of the case. Would recommend anyone looking for a new drone.
customer_reviews.author: zain

customer_reviews.title: Fun Little Drone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my six year old sons birthday. Honestly, when I got it in, it was much smaller than expected, BUT, we have had so much fun with this! Remote was easy to learn, it comes with propeller guards so when we run into walls it doesn’t tear it up. Also includes spare parts in the event something does get messed up. We fly it around the house and land it all over. 2 charging options make it good for on the go as well. It’s been 6 weeks and we are still using the original batteries we put in the remote. Simple & fun. Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Fun little beginner drone
customer_reviews.text: Our six year old loves this fun little drone. He's been begging for one and this time Santa came through. I searched and researched and the reviews are right on. This has been easy for him to figure out. He lands easily and it's a tough little guy, making it through some hits and misses on bookshelves and walls. We will look forward to upgrading him when he's ready with a camera drone from Holy Stone. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Luvtogether

customer_reviews.title: portable
customer_reviews.text: it is a nice drone to take on the go with it being stored in the controller. the controller is to large to fit in a pocket easily but you can put it in a bag and not worry about breaking a propeller. also the ability to charge the drone using the controller is nice. now just because it is easy to fly and seems stable i would not recommend taking it outside, it is a small light weight drone that is greatly affected by wind.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fly outside!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son’s 6th Birthday. It’s a nice durable drone and has been pretty easy for my son to learn to use. Unfortunately, he can only fly it inside. We have tried multiple times to fly it outside and it never fails, it’s syarts to drift away. We have tried on days that there seemed to be no wind at all and even the slightest breeze will make it drift. Landed on the roof of the house once and we had to go get it. I will not allow him outside with it anymore for fear it will disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great value drone, to learn how to fly.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Easy to fly. I couldn't really get the headless mode to work, but as far as economy drones go, this one is very easy to fly indoors once you get good at setting the trim, and resetting the trim after you crash. Have probably 30+ flights before needing to replace one of the blades, which they include 4 spares. I let my five year old fly it, after I set the trim, get the direction pointed in the right way and am hovering about five feet in front of him. He can even do flips. In fact, that is his favorite thing to do. I control the altitude, and rotation stick. He controls the speed and direction.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy !!! It came highly recommended in my search for a mini drone, and it has lived up to all the hype! It is well-engineered and well-designed, with very stable hovering, precise motion, and agile flipping. I love that I have the option of charging it directly from the case when needed. The packaging is beautiful and sturdy and well-designed also, which adds a nice touch and a boost of confidence in the makers. This is one of two Holy Stone drones that I own and both exceed expectations! I intend to fly mostly indoors, as its light weight and small size leave it liable to be carried away in a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Sent me another one and it worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this gift for my son. And initially didn't like it. After one flight it started acting weird. I wrote a review and Holy Stone instantly sent me a new one. This one has been much better and my son and I love it. It occansionaly drifts but it's just a little and you hardly notice it. It is really good for this price. It does awesome tricks like frontflips, backflips. That impress all of his friends. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor drone!
customer_reviews.text: This drone is very nice; especially for indoor use. It flies very smoothly and is easy to control. It can also take a beating if you crash it. Crashing is inevitable if you fly indoors and you are new to drone piloting. The battery life is very good. It may not seem like a lot, but 6 - 7 minutes of flight time is quite a bit. If you are looking for a solid drone that is great for indoors and beginners, I recommend the HS190 from Holy Stone.
customer_reviews.author: R. Green

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Parts are very small and come apart easily. Simply does not work and both son and grandson totally frustrated and disappointed in its lack of quality. Would've returned it but granddaughter had discorded packaging. Was a surprise gift and failed. Falls apart and not made for kids, or their parents.
customer_reviews.author: Rocker

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!! Not just with a nice product but company too.
customer_reviews.text: After a hiccup this company stepped up amazingly and stood by their product without blinking an eye. Honestly, the type of customer service you get from your local small town shop. My son is enjoying, laughing and having fun...that’s all that matters. Also, extremely impressed with the altitude and distance thing little mighty beast has. I’ll be sharing this product with our family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: jared moore

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a 5th grader! Loves the drone. He found it easy to do some tricks and has wonderful control with the remote. Down side is how short battery life is (10-15 minutes) before you have to recharge it. On the up side, charging is quick. The propellers are showing a little damage from the few times it has hit the wall or other objects (plants) with the way my kid flies at times but it hasn't stopped working and still flies great. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: After using it a few times, it would stop responding to the remote commands in the middle of a flight and go off wherever it seemed to want to go. Husband took it to the park and it would not respond to directional prompts and flew off never to be seen again. We know it needs re-calibration after a crash but why it would go rogue in the middle of good flights is the question.
customer_reviews.author: Cathrine C.

customer_reviews.title: My son loved this
customer_reviews.text: Great value for your buck. I bought this for my son for his birthday as he requested he absolutely loves it. The only thing that I noticed is that the battery runs out fairly quickly but not sure if that is common with drones. After 3 weeks the motor went out so I need to replace it. I'm sure that can happen if someone is a inexperienced and keeps crashing.
customer_reviews.author: G-Faith

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding gift.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome is inadequate. The entire family LOVED this gift. It needs just one battery in the controller, as I recall. The little plane, itself, can be recharged with a five volt wall transformer or on the computer. A charge cord is included. The little helicopter has to be recharged after 7 minutes, for 30 minutes or so, but it is such fun that no one seemed to mind.
customer_reviews.author: Luvslace

customer_reviews.title: Fun drone
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with what you get for the price. Been a week and countless crashes, still going strong. Great first drone for a kid, even the seven year old does well. Could do better to explain the differences with the prop rotation and the replacement propellers. We though it was broken until we looked at the picture on the box and figured out half the props are different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect much for $35, but i bought two for my kids. Both worked fine for three days, but then one refuses to lift off evenly after that. I tried recalibrating and all the troubleshooting tips, but it didn't help. Just waiting to see how long the other will last till that too stops working. The blades don't look as though they'll last any longer either; even with that guards inplace
customer_reviews.author: Trinidad Dill

customer_reviews.title: Super drone cannot go wrong!!
customer_reviews.text: The drone is super stable and sturdy too. It’s easy to learn and lots of fun. I really like the included bump guards they really help us as we get to be better pilots. Overall I am pumped I bought this drone. It’s fun fast and stable. It would be nice if it folded with the bump guards installed but if that is the only downside this drone is a real winner
customer_reviews.author: J. Koth

customer_reviews.title: HS190 Quad
customer_reviews.text: Neat little quad! I love that this quad has its own little holder inside the controller, which makes it very portable. (Throw it in your pocket). Has an on board charger, but I do recommend buying 4 AAA rechargeable batteries for the controller so on the go charging you don't eat through tons of money on batteries. Pretty fast quad for it size! If your looking for a travel mini quad or of course home use , this one might be just what your looking for.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: fun and zippy for a cheap drone
customer_reviews.text: Fun little drone to fly around with. You can definitely tell the differences between the speeds and how it handles. We average 6-10 minutes of flight depending on what we all do with it. The flips and spins are kind of a fun little bonus, and the trim buttons are easy access for stability in one spot. Havent done much with headless mode and not sure if it worked or does what we think it's supposed to do, still fun. Perfect little drone to play around with inside during bad weather days. If taking it outside, I'd make sure winds are 5mph or less. Charges within 45 minutes to be back up again
customer_reviews.author: TanTan

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: This was my first drone, and the second product I purchased from Holy Stone. I am very happy with the product. It was quality, well made, and had great instructions which I used to learn how to fly the drone. They also included extra propeller blades and propeller guards which will come in handy. It took about 30 minutes of practice to become efficient in operating the drone. Honestly, I crashed it several times, but it held up great. I was so happy with the product, I purchased a bigger, more expensive drone (with a camera) from Holy Stone. No complaints, would surly purchase again as a beginner drone!
customer_reviews.author: Na'eem Abu Hafsa

customer_reviews.title: As good as the reviews say it is
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fun. Not sure it is for kids. Its pretty fast for a small little thing. Fiying it indoors takes more than average skill, not expert but it is pretty quick. I fly it outside in light wind with my kids. They also send you a card to get another set of stock propellers, battery charger and a few other things. It also takes a good beating indoors and out. The battery is internal and charges via usb by way of phone charger. I have had it less than a month, hoping the battery and motors holdout longer than other $30-40 drones. Nice work though Holy Stone, I will buy other models based on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tipton Family

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive! A must have!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is WOW! I wasn’t sure what to expect when I ordered this product. I ordered this product for my teenage son and he loves it! And yes when he’s not flying it, I am. I would definitely recommend this product. It is easy to fly. Recharge time is quick. 3 different speed modes. Very compact and fits in the remote when not in use. Auto take off and auto land with the push of a button. Does left, right, forward and backwards flips. Rotates in a tight circle with the push of a button. White LED light in the front. Also has red and blue LEDs for low light orientation. Definitely well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: So easy a 6 year old can use it
customer_reviews.text: So cool. My six year old wanted a drone for Christmas, and I really didn't want him to have one with a camera. This was perfect. He was so good at flying it by the end of the day. He could make it do tricks, land in his hand and fly through our chandelier. I bought the extra parts just in case, but so far, he's managed not to break it - and it took a few tumbles when he was learning. I also love that it folds up and can live inside the controller.
customer_reviews.author: J T

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out of box
customer_reviews.text: This Drone didn't work right out of box. The cord to charge it from the computer was defective. Tried to charge it with the battery controller for 5 hours still didn't work. Would not recommend this drone to anyone. Bought for grandson he was very upset because it didn't work. Sending it back ASAP and getting my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Schorr

customer_reviews.title: recommend for beginners and children. fun for all age..
customer_reviews.text: really nice and stable drone. it has it's built in charger on the control. many option. worth the cost. update: wow. totally awesome drone. my friend who has a DJI drone that cost $2K was so impressed of what this can do his going to get his own for inside flying. A+++++++++ also great to get your dogs to work out. my dogs love chasing this done. more update: after being eaten by my dogs it still works!!!! have to get more for my friends. LOL. great drone and great flying time!!!!
customer_reviews.author: never again shop retail

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Great for first time users - very easy to set up and start flying (took about 15 minutes after charging). Really the only downside is that you don't get more than about 7 minutes flying time on a full charge, but that seems to be standard for this size drone, which just doesn't make any sense to me. What kid is ready to put down a toy after 7 minutes?!
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great little gadget for the money. I've gotten 2 of these so far for a 9 and 11 year old. Small, so easy to take to park, etc. And fly inside. I was able to see one in action this time and was amazed at how well it flew and how long. Great little gift. They need more colors, my cousins sister wants one, she's 10 but doesn't like the colors. She wanted pink or sparkle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unable to fly :(
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! I bought this for a present for my son's birthday. Three out of four of the propellers work, but the drone can not fly. It was built incorrectly. I wish I could return it, but we kept it hidden until the birthday this weekend and the 30 day return time has passed. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Well done!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!! Bought this for our 8 year old boy. He has had several drones that have listed for only a short period of time. This drone is very user friendly once a parent reviews the details with the child. Per the booklet, a 14 year old boy would definitely be able handle it with ease. Our 8 year old can too once it is explained. This is a great stepping stone from the toy drones to a real expensive one later!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly agile flyer!!!  Lots of fun for both beginners and experienced.
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! I didn't expect much from this tiny drone, but what a surprise!!! Took this tiny guy to the beach expecting it to blow right away like most other tiny drones. That didn't happen at all. This foldable drone that fits right into the controller took the light sea breeze like a champ. The controls are beautifully responsive, you can zip this little guy around and have so much fun indoor and outdoor. The only downside is waiting for battery to recharge between flights as the battery is not removable. That being said, the flight time is pretty good for its size.
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of the holy stone drones, i love them. One was for my husband who's 40, and he loves it. The second is for my 6 year old and he loves it just as much as his dad loves his. We have a vast area to fly the dones. These are great little gifts. I would most definitely recommend for any one starting out , or looking at being a first time buyer to consider this product.
customer_reviews.author: Weebs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased the HS 190 small drone for my grandson in mid October. Doing Christmas shopping early. When he opened it on Christmas day we could not get it to work. After multiple failure attempts all day I called customer service at holystone to report it. After conversing with two or three customer service service reps , I was assured I would receive a replacement. Within two weeks I did. The customer service reps were very courteous and helpful and I am very pleased with the solution they offered. I definitely would do business with them again. For me they receive an A+ in customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L Allen

customer_reviews.title: It worked great until...
customer_reviews.text: It worked great until....my husband flew it into the woods after two hours. Never to be seen again. But it did do everything it said it would. It was neat and portable and handled well. Charging was easy because you didn’t have to take it apart. We ordered another one because it was a Christmas gift for our 8 year old daughter. This time we got one a little bigger and with yellow propellers. But overall a great product. ;)
customer_reviews.author: C. C. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Not for kids
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my 10 year old nephew but its so small and very hard to operate. It doesn't start most of the time and needs to be calibrated again and again. Battery life is too bad as well. Giving 3 stars just because it works and fly as mentioned in description. LoL
customer_reviews.author: @mit

customer_reviews.title: I love how the drone stores in the remote controller
customer_reviews.text: The HS190 Foldable Mini Nano RC Drone really packs a punch! I love how the drone stores in the remote controller, except that the guards have to be removed w/no storage available. Holy Stone is the ultimate #1 for drones. Customer service is excellent! The sales representative, Grace was so nice and so helpful in helping me choose my drones. She keeps great communication with me, she has from the very start when I discovered Holy Stone. She feels like a family member. Thanks so much for such good quality drones & the excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to fly, great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: This mini drone is perfect for kids! I have 3 boys ages 7,12 & 14 and they all enjoy flying it. Also, this is sturdy. Most of the drones or RC flying objects break within a short time. We have been using this one for a couple of weeks with daily use and it is still in great shape!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a few minutes then it dies.
customer_reviews.text: It's a fun toy but the battery lasts about 7 minutes only and takes about 30 to charge. So very little play time. For a young kid to control was tricky because there are so many different buttons and controls. I knew it was mini but I just thought it would have been bigger than my hand atleast. My mistake for not looking at the detentions properly.
customer_reviews.author: RaeAnne Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Easy, even for absolute beginners
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my son for his birthday from his wishlist. He really likes it and is able to control it very well even though he's only 9 years old. It's easy to lift up, land, and do flips. We lost the instruction booklet but he was able to figure out how to use it from a youtube video. Can charge from a regular usb plug, or from provided plug to controller (uses batteries to charge). Only part that hasn't worked is the "return to home" feature, but that's probably just from not using it correctly. I'll google the instruction book later.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hallas

customer_reviews.title: Best quadcopter I own
customer_reviews.text: Best quadcopter I own. Super stable flying, durable, and portable. My only complaint is about the controller. Its so ugly and edgy. The material finish is terrible and feels super cheap. Aside from the controller, I would recommend this to anyone. Flight time is excellent too. I get about 10-15 of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Andranik

customer_reviews.title: would go another way
customer_reviews.text: Even though it isn't hard to learn to use, I think I would rather have bought my grandson the kind you control with just your hands. The drone was suppose to return to where it was launched from but he has to go looking for it, maybe he is not doing something right.
customer_reviews.author: L.Easley

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Quadcopter
customer_reviews.text: Great Little Quadcopter for learning how to fly indoors. The mini drone has some great features, like headless mode and altitude hold, that makes this thing a breeze to fly; and it's small enough to have plenty of space indoors. The controller is probably my only complaint, as the design is a bit off and it can be a little chunky & complicated for younger pilots. Flight times are between 6-10 minutes, it just depends on how you fly it and which mode you use.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 1st drone/micro drone
customer_reviews.text: Such a neat little drone. Smaller than the palm of your hand. Excellent controller with lots of options. Sturdy design and flight. Super fast on the high setting. Do not recommend flying in small spaces on full speed. great selection of settings and features for a tiny drone. Excellent indoor device.
customer_reviews.author: Bank

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice little Drone
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little drone to practice on, I highly recommend it. This is my second drone from Holy Stone and they both are great drones. I fly this little drone at work to practice on. when it runs out of power I just hook it up to my laptop, doesn't take long to charge. You wont be disappointed with this drone.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great little nanocopter
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest nanocopter to fly ever. I have been having a blast flying it and doin flips since I got it. It’s designed so that the drone fits into and can be charged in the remote control. I had an issue with a faulty charging cable that the customer service department replaced at no charge immediately (they also sent me extra rotors and guards to be nice) I am so pleased with the purchase from the price, to the design and function of the HS 190 to the great customer support.
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: great birthday present!!! Fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This product was great. My nephew has been wanting a drone , for quite a while now and I felt this was something to get him started for a drone flying lesson lol we opened the box and my first thoughts was it was so small. Which made him more excited. For him,( being into ninjas) this was "perfect for his make-believe, spy on the enemy attacks" lol it really does fly and even though a smudge above required age group he handled this drone real well. So I would say its great for beginners and has easy remote control.... one happy child and frankly this was pretty neat!!! Honestly I've tried it and love it too hehe
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought the drone for my 6 year old nephew and when we took it out we were pleasantly surprised. Not only was it good quality, but it was level while idle and awesome!!!! We even strapped a lego figure to it for him. We played for so long with it and my own kids and husband wanted one. So I hopped onto amazon and bought ANOTHER! The price was unbeatable and the quality was exceptional. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Was not good
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one for my grandson. We recieved it with scratches on it propellars were bent and the speed did not change. This one must have been a defective one. That is to bad because my grandson was so excited only to be let down because of a defective or poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: luvinlife

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: My parents bought this for my six-year-old son. Just so you know, this thing is much smaller than you expect. It’s like tiny. The battery life is a bit short. I’m not sure how long this will last because it seems kind of delicate but my kids haven’t destroyed it yet.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself to mess around with indoors, and I love it. It's easy to set up and start flying right away, and it doesn't seem like you can really break it or break anything else with it in the house. My nine year old niece kept asking for mine, so I had to order her one as well. She picked up the controls, no problem and loves it too. This is my second Holy Stone drone (I've actually never tried another brand). My first is one of the larger ones. They've got a great product in my experience. I can't speak on their support though because I haven't needed it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great drone, blades broken by my son.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the drone. The only problem? My son hit it against the wall while flying and broke a few blades. Now it can fly balance. Would buy it again. Replacement blades are not as cheap. In this difficult times hard to pay the extra bucks. Now, the thing is FAST and nice to handle. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Herasme

customer_reviews.title: READ INSTRUCTIONS & explain to kids!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old grandson got this for a birthday gift. Instructions weren't fully explained to him & the Drone was quickly lost. Still lost, we have several neighbors watching out for it. He had fun for the few minutes he got to play with it. So we purchased him a new one. I wish the controller had some kind of location finder on it. That would've been very helpful. Otherwise it's a great fun little toy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Drone with great control!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This drone is by far the best I have had, and I have had quite a few!!! It can get slightly annoying with how you have to start it, but other than that a GREAT drone. It has the best control I have ever seen, And even when on the fastest speed in a small room, it is super easy to control!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Shorr

customer_reviews.title: one of the best drones i have ever gotten i love it !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: this is a great item and i am getting it again it is so good i completely recommend it because it is strong,compact,poratable,works amazing,and goes incredible fast with great reception. i would recommend it for a little skilled drone flyers. also watch out you might want to get extra voters or at least be prepared to return it if not, the reason being is because the mother has a high chance to break if your not careful [from experience] i would recommend the roter guards.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy dean

customer_reviews.title: Holly Stone HS190
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size of it for flying in the house but turn it up if you take it outside to practice Camille ( customer service ) did fantastic job with helping me with this awsome little bird as she has helped in the past As I said,awesome little bird and will buy more from Holy Stone because of the quality products they sale and CUSTOMER SERVICE that they provide. Thank You Holy Stone and thank You Camille !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beginner Drone
customer_reviews.text: This beginner drone is a hit with my 10 year old child. Once paired and learned, he can do tricks in the house and fly around the house. Battery lasts about 30 minutes. Great teaching little Drone. Smaller than expected, but flies really well.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Not really an outside drone
customer_reviews.text: My 11yr old loves this drone but it had a habit of not responding to the controls on the remote. It’s so small that when it doesn’t respond to the remote, it becomes very difficult to find outside. I recommend this only for inside use because of this issue. My son flew his outside, it took off and we could not find it.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor G.

customer_reviews.title: The Drone was a hit with grandkids !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little gem for my 8-year-old grandson and his siblings. They play with it all the time. It must be very durable as I understand he still loves to play with it. I not only would recommend it, but I would also buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bud French

customer_reviews.title: I ended up buying four more because everybody loved them and wanted to play
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought two of these for early Christmas presents. I ended up buying four more because everybody loved them and wanted to play. They fly well and are easy to handle. We also liked the fact that the drone folds into the control area for easy storage. Buy and extra set of blades just in case because you will probably be flying this alot!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kincy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many types of drones over the years and this one is just perfect for indoor and outdoor operation. A very compact and very portable drone that is good for kids as well. Bought it for my son, and at age 11 he can easily operate the drone and have tons of fun around the house.
customer_reviews.author: SS16

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compact size!
customer_reviews.text: This little drone is great for beginners, I got it for my two puppies, they love to chase it around my condo, and the unused tennis courts at the near by park, and it’s compact size is perfect for putting in a bag or even your pocket. I would definitely Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy James 24K

customer_reviews.title: Fun little drone!
customer_reviews.text: This little drone is great! I have the Holy Stone HS160 and decided to get this mini drone for indoor flying. It's really easy to control, I just gotta turn off any fans for more stabilization. I flew it outside a couple times with mild wind and I lost control of the drone. It crashed a few times but there's no sign of damage and it still flies well. Highly recommend for kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great little drone.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very fun little drone. I don't know how it compares to other drone's as its the first one I've flown but I picked it up pretty quick after crashing it a few times. It survived all crashes unharmed and is still flying strong!
customer_reviews.author: Rob P.

customer_reviews.title: Best drone so far
customer_reviews.text: Got this drone for my son. He usually ruins any drone I get him in a day. But he really wanted to try again. Based on other reviews I decided to to try again with this one. He has had this drone now for weeks and absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: brown eyes

customer_reviews.title: So easy to fly!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic drone for the price. It even stores itself inside the remote! Out of the box, it flew perfectly and we didn't even have to calibrate it. It flies so smoothly and even does a spinning trick (see the video). My 8-year old had no trouble flying it around, taking off and landing perfectly. For a low-cost easy to fly drone, this one can't be beat. In addition, Holy Stone is great to work with. Though I did not have to contact them on this particular model, we've had other Holy Stone drones in the past and their technical support team is fantastic and very responsive. My son and I highly recommend this drone!
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Great little drone!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our almost 7 year old yesterday. It's much better than I expected! I couldn't figure out how to get it to fly, but 5 seconds in the hands of my son and it was flying all over the house! It seems almost indestructable. He has flown it into walls (hard) and had tough landings. Only word of advice, don't get it near someone's hair! It is the perfect size and he has deemed it "the best present I ever got!" So happy I did my research and got this one for him. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AK1234

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Drone!
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome miniature drone! Bought it for my 13 year old son, and he loves it and has tons of fun. I have purchased plenty of Air Hogs helicopters and other similar products in the past, and nothing is as entertaining as the Holy Stone Mini Drone. Battery life isn't very long, but charge time is pretty decent, and again, my son has so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Guzman

customer_reviews.title: It needs an improved return to home. But worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This would’ve easily been a five star. The drone itself is very high quality with easy setup. And the bumpers are very solid. Also the drone is very durable as it’s already taken a couple bumps. This is a very sophisticated drone for the price and size. )Altitude control, return to home, headless, etc.) however, the reasons this is four stars is because, 1) the return to home feature has nearly taken my head off, needs a bit of improvement, and 2) (this isn’t huge) but the remote is a bit clunky and weirdly shaped. Other than that would 100% recommend. Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Fun to play outside
customer_reviews.text: This drone can be quick, and it's a lot of fun to play outside. With the slow setting you can also play inside, but I don't think you should consider this much. It fits right in the controller, it's easy to carry around. They could improve by adding a rechargeable battery on the controller since you can recharge the drone on the controller itself, and it uses 4 AAA.
customer_reviews.author: Cícero Ribeiro Piva

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Even Better Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Bought this drone for my 8 year old son after we tried several other brands of mini drones with limited success. He is a novice, but was able to get it up and running by himself with limited supervision. Worked perfectly out of the box and he flew it around with confidence and precision. A few weeks ago, it unexpectedly stopped working. I contacted Holy Stone customer service and had the pleasure of working with Camille. After a brief exchange, she sent out some replacement motors. She was genuine and extremely helpful . She periodically followed up and offered several suggestions until I figured out the issue. I highly recommend this product, as well as Holy Stone as a company!
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 yr old got this for Christmas. He really enjoys it! We’ve had it for a week and so far it’s still performing well. The flips are impressive.. for us drone novices. And no, you do not need a ten foot space to pull it off.
customer_reviews.author: tskanagas

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner drone!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for my 9 year old son who had no previous experience with flying drones and he took to it pretty quickly. The controls were very easy to learn and the speed of the drone wasn't too much for a beginner. I am sure I will purchase again from the company.
customer_reviews.author: JMerr1020

customer_reviews.title: Died in a few month.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for a Christmas gift for my friend. He loved it. I tried it when I went to his house, had so much fun with it . I would definitely not recommend this product. My friend is 62 years old. It only lasted for 3-4 months. He wants another one (of course, not this drone). I will shop for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners and Experienced Pilots
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for your first quadcopter or want to improve your flying skills don't even hesitate to buy this little guy! It is super stable and controllable so it makes flying easy. I would say my skill level is intermediate and it is still fun to fly on the higher speed settings. It has a lot of zip and handles like a champ, so really any skill level I would recommend. The only downside is you cant charge it while it is folded in the case. Other then that you can charge it with the charger which is nice. It makes for a true "through in your bag and go quadcopter"
customer_reviews.author: NiteShadow

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic drone for indoor flying
customer_reviews.text: The drone is easy to set up and just takes a few minutes to learn. Since the drone is small it is fantastic for indoor flying and acrobatics. The small camera on the front makes it a lot of fun to fly through the house and up the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drone for beginners or experts!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter LOVES this drone. It was easy to learn. The best feature for her is that the drone fits inside the remote and can be charged in that way. Soooo coool!!! Also the battery seems to last much longer than other drones we’ve owned for longer flying time. The only thing I’d love (you probably have it at a higher price point) is video capability. Hours of fun! Bought it a month ago and She still can’t put it down.
customer_reviews.author: Ogo

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to fly
customer_reviews.text: This quad-copter can fly indoors very well. The control is very precise. It keeps its altitude stable when it turns and pivoting back and forth. I've owned two other quad-copters before this one, but only this one maintains it's altitude and responds in direct proportion to what you give it by remote control. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: rdcleaners

customer_reviews.title: Very good customer support
customer_reviews.text: Love the little drone. It’s very small but just right for my needs. Support was awesome and sent me a new blade guard without hassle. Very fast, efficient support. So far very happen despite one missing part (blade guard) in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners and hobbiest
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas 2018 and I play with it more then he does because I dont want him to break it but it is very durable and really easy to use and extremely fun to fly!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was great and everything was great except for the screwdriver. The screwdriver did not have enough glue it was very easy to control very fun and just a great product i would give it a 9/10
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good agility and fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: These were a great buy for kids to play with inside or even outside. The flips are pretty neat and easy to control. They are quite small, so you don't have to worry about finding space for them or flying into walls or something. I would recommend this for kids who want to learn tricks and flips on a mini drone. The price is right too!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Conte

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! Easy to learn very quickly, and control. My 12yo loves it, and learned to do tricks the first day. Just make sure u fly it AWAY from ceiling fans and heads!! It is fast for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for younger kids!
customer_reviews.text: We had bought this drone for our 6 year old son . It is incredible easy to handle and lot of fun. My son loves it and keep flying inside / outside home. We already have three other drown belong to my 11 year old son but not that easy to fly. My 11 year also love this one, even more than his other drones. I recommend it for beginners and also it might better do not go on the fastest speed until you can fly it properly, that will not take much time. Over all it is a great drone for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Saf

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my son and my husband should habe gotten his own! It's allot of fun! Much smaller than I expected, but I probably just didn't read that part of the description.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: More fun than a barrel of monkeys - way more!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas but It was more of a gift for me. Love this thing. It is so fun to fly around the house. I can't believe it is so easy to fly and has so many features for so little $. It got me so interested I purchased a DJI drone for outdoors. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

product_meta.title: Holy Stone HS190 Foldable Mini Nano RC Drone for Kids Gift Portable Pocket Quadcopter with Altitude Hold 3D Flips and Headless Mode Easy to Fly for Beginners
feature_bullets: Altitude Hold Function: Powerful air pressure altitude hold function allows you to release the throttle stick and the drone will keep hovers at it's current height.
Foldable and Easy to Carry: This mini quadcopter can be folded into the controller, which is small and easy to carry.
One Key Take off / Landing: Drone automatically hovers at a set altitude after take-off and before landing making it easy to control and maneuver, especially for beginners who are not yet skilled.
Headless Mode and One Key Return: Enable players of any level to fly and operate the drone easily; One Key Return: press this button in Headless Mode, the drone will automatically come back to you.
High Speed Rotation: New and interesting function. The drone can do 360° circle and fly at high speeds, offering you a special and exciting feeling.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,705 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
